name: Langlil Island: Una Paranoya mental en el Tiempo
name_original: Langlil Island: Una Paranoya mental en el Tiempo
description:
This is a persistent data c# homework which consists of spatial puzzles on a mysterious island.

In this game, we have to save the game, exit and change the gamesettings for altering the year of the game the next time we play. Changes affects the island. Use them to get through around the isle.

Tips:

The book is your best tool when you're stuck. Also, you shall get access to different  tools in accordance with diferent ages (maps, photos).

Tools:

- Early 20th: Aerial-view map and photos.

- Late 20th: A book about baltic shores, including historic information.

- 13th to 19th centuries: A map of the island

- 1000 to 1200: You can note down nordic mesagges

Controls:

Q - Help Tools

Esc - Menu
